snippet: Months after the countries reached a nuclear accord, Iran’s highest leader said other negotiations were “forbidden.”
abstract: Iran’s highest leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, considered architect and arbitrator of nuclear treaty, tells Revolutionary Guards commanders that he forbids further talks with United States because it is trying to infiltrate Iran through negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Months after the countries reached a nuclear accord, Iran’s highest leader said other negotiations were “forbidden.”

headline.main: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei Warns Against More U.S.-Iran Talks
headline.print_headline: Ayatollah Warns Against More Talks Between Iran and the U.S.
